Text.Page:
! It's an emergency!

I got a letter from the Sanctum Mysterium and they want to close down our Fishery.
We might never fish here again!

Will you go and have a talk with {@linkcreature:207#1010#Meridien}?

And of course you shouldn't go empty handed."What should I take?"

This recipe should do the trick.

I haven't met anyone who doesn't like a fish dish!

Give {@linkcreature:207#1010#Meridien} a marinated fish.

You can buy most of the ingredients from a Fishing Supplies merchant, or buy the dish direct from the Trade Broker.
On the way to Sanctum Mysterium, <PCNAME> answered a distress call from Meridien.

That...that's marinated fish.

Are you attempting to bribe me?"Actually, yes."

I'm blown away. The salt and the vinegar blend so well with the fish!

A truly outstanding meal.

Thank you.

What to do...what to do...

What is it? Please do not disturb me if it's not an emergency.

You're from the Fishing Association, right? I'm sorry, but your Fishery has to remain closed for now.

The thing is...there was an accident. Your fishery has been contaminated with Experimental Elinum, and we can't risk it spreading.

Now, if someone were to retreive it...."I'll get it back for you."

Good.

Since you're not catching fish today, you'll need some Celisium Fragments to retrieve the Elinum.

If you run out, there's plenty more.

And don't worry, it's totally not toxic.
Totally.

You got them all!

Thank you so much.

I'll have a word with the Head Researcher and get the Fishery reopened.

You're back. And without all the Elinium, I see.

It's a simple equation. Use Celisium Fragments to retrieve Experimental Elinium from the Muricai Fishery, and the fish will come back.

All the Celesium you'll need is in the boxes next to me.
